ComicInfo.Summary:
Regular SolicitVoodoo vengeance created Victor Crowley and it may destroy him too! When a drug lord engages the power of a voodoo priestess for revenge, something ancient and terrible rises from the swamp to kill Crowley and everything in its wake. It's a clash of swamp titans and anything in their path is fair game for the wanton slaughter to follow. Hatchet Vengeance #2 comes with three covers - Main Voodoo by interior artist Puis Calzada, Curse of Crowley by Buz Hasson & Ken Haeser, and limited edition Bloody Horror cover also by Calzada.
Bloody Horror SolicitGet this super limited 350 copy of Hatchet Vengeance Bloody Horror Edition #2! Don't miss a chance to put this bloody Limited-Edition issue under glass with your favorite grading company!
Extreme Gore SolicitSplatter artist Andrew Mangum delivers another bloody installment of the Limited Edition "Extreme Gore" Hatchet covers limited to a scant 350 copy print run . Send this special slasher edition to your favorite comic grading company before Victor Crowley rips your face off with a belt sander!
